item.title: Potholes on Barnmeadow Road, winchcombe, 1st January
item.description:
Lots on barnmeadow road at junction with Orchard Road. Road used by construction vehicles coming from two building sites near delavale road and Orchard road. Large dumper trucks, etc . Potholes full of water so hard to see, but very deep.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orchard Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe

item.title: Wall encroaching public footpath, 31st December
item.description:
Footpath is encroached by wall building (illegal?) over edge of footpath. Bricks and building debris litter the footpath. This issue was reported at beginning of November there has been no council action to date.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 58a, Mead Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New graffiti tags along wall, 31st December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 60, Mead Road, Naunton, Cheltenham

item.title: Excessive accumulation of leaves and storm debris, 31st December
item.description:
The whole of Keynsham Road street and associated pavements need cleaning due to the excessive accumulation of leaves and storm debris causing potential slippage issues on the pavement and currently blocking road drains leading to localised road flooding
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90a, Keynsham Road, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree overhanging public footpath and private driveway by 132 Abbotswood Road,, 31st December
item.description:
Tree is willow and very brittle, with smaller limbs falling onto footpath in recent storms but whole Tree is leaning dangerously.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbotswood Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: There seems to be some damage/hole next to a drainhole cover and the kerbstone has become dislodged., 31st December
item.description:
The damage is outside number 94. The kerbstone has become loose and seems to have been pushed upwards. There is a small hole in the road next to the drain/cover but I cannot see what damage is underneath and whether there is any damage to the drainage which is in very close proximity to the kerbstone/small hole. The kerbstone needs to be refixed and any damage investigated.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Laynes Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water gushing from manhole cover, 31st December
item.description:
Drain is outside The Old Bovey on Farm Lane, Shurdington. Severn Trent Water have inspected it but say itâ€™s a blocked flood drain and not their responsibility. Water is gushing out very fast and flowing into the drain in the Main Road but that has issues of blocking so Main Road might become dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farm Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42,44, Kayte Lane, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: British Gas went through electric, sewer trying to put a property on to gas pipes and the streets lights haven't worked since, 31st December
item.description:
All the street lamps from number 32 Welland Drive Cheltenham GL52 3HA to the alley are out. The person living at 32 is registered blind and when she returns from club it is exceedingly difficult and frighting for her to find her gate and drive way. The lights have been out since 14 December
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pittville Circus Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
By lamp post before turning left into Millbridge Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Porchester Road, Gloucester

item.title: Broken drain cover and hole., 31st December
item.description:
This issue has been reported and repaired however, overnight the repair has been smashed out by traffic. The hole is now worse than the original problem. The hole is down to the concrete, well over 75mm. It is causing noise, which disturbs sleep in the adjacent properties. The drain cover is loose and not fixed in place any more. The drain is still blocked (although reported). It needs immediate repair. Although I would request it is repaired properly this time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 31st December
item.description:
75mm pothole full of water
Report on FixMyStreet
